{"id":592671575,"lang":"python3","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1637879495,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"201 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/592671575/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"14.4 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def isToeplitzMatrix(self, matrix: List[List[int]]) -> bool:\n        toeplitz = []\n        m = len(matrix)\n        n = len(matrix[0])\n        l = 1\n        k = m-1\n        high = max(m,n)\n        while k > -high and l < n+1:\n            diagnals = []\n            for j in range(0,l):\n                for i in range(0,m):\n                    if i-j == k:\n                        diagnal = matrix[i][j]\n                        diagnals.append(diagnal)\n            l += 1\n            k -= 1\n            toeplitz.append(diagnals)\n            \n        l = n - 1\n        k = 1\n        while k < m+1 and l > -high:\n            diagnals = []\n            for j in range(0,n):\n                for i in range(0,k):\n                    if j-i == l:\n                        diagnal = matrix[i][j]\n                        diagnals.append(diagnal)\n            l -= 1\n            k += 1\n            toeplitz.append(diagnals)\n        \n        for t in toeplitz:\n            t_set = set(t)\n            if len(t_set) > 1:\n                return False\n        return True\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix"}
